resources.string: This app can\'t work without knowing your location. If you change your mind, please grant the authorization through the Settings panel of your device.
In order to work, this app needs to access your location. Sadly, looks like your device cannot provide this information, so the app can\'t work properly.
Looks like you are offline! Please check that your device is connected to the phone network.

If you are a travelling worker, this app is made just for you.
To start, I will ask you to specify your working schedule; only within this schedule, I will share your location with your potential customers, who will be able to see it on a map.

Do you agree?
